00022 class CTreeCall;
00023 class CTreeGraph;

00026 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00027 /// CTreeGraph
00028 /// 
00029 /// @description  The CTreeGraph class is a container for the nodes in a tree
00030 ///               graph.  It provides complete and unsecured access to its
00031 ///               attributes.
00032 ///               The CTreeGraph also encapsulates its own file I/O for both
00033 ///               saving and loading.  For image output of the tree layout see
00034 ///               the CTreeGraphRenderer.
00035 ///
00036 /// @limitations  Direct use of this class can be very dangerous.  It is 
00037 ///               recommended that this class be placed inside a 
00038 ///               CTreeGraphModel before interacting with it.
00039 ///
00040 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041 class CTreeTrace
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     CTreeTrace();
00045     CTreeTrace( CTreeGraph *treeGraph );
00046     CTreeTrace( STreeNode *rootNode );
00047     ~CTreeTrace();
00048     
00049     void trace( STreeNode *rootNode );
00050     
00051     QStringList getColumnNames();
00052     CTreeCall *getRootCall();
00053     QList<QStringList> getLineList();
00054     
00055 private:
00056     //This variable is used to store a pointer to the root of the tree graph.
00057     CTreeCall *m_rootCall;
00058 };
00059 
00060 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00061 /// CTreeCall
00062 /// 
00063 /// @description  The CTreeCall class represents a call in the algorithm. IThere
00064 ///               can be multiple lines per call.
00065 ///
00066 /// @limitations  None
00067 ///
00068 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00069 class CTreeCall
00070 {
00071 public:
00072     CTreeCall( STreeNode *node = NULL, bool max = true );
00073     ~CTreeCall();
00074     
00075     void setAsRoot( bool root = true );
00076     
00077     QList<QStringList> getLineList();
00078 
00079 private:
00080     void minimax_max( STreeNode *node );
00081     void minimax_min( STreeNode *node );
00082 
00083     QList<CTreeCall *>  m_children;
00084     QList<QStringList>  m_lines;
00085     
00086     float     m_returnValue;
00087     STreeNode *m_node;
00088 };
